name: an Unexpected Search
description:
- an Unexpected Search -

a prototype game made for the : Vimjam 2020 event.

Controls:

WASD , Arrow Keys - for movement

E - open / close doors

F - Strike (enabled when you find your arms)

SPACE - Jump (enabled when you find you legs)

ESC - Pause Menu (can be used to replay the level)

made with care by:

@3koozy - Programmer

@Sir_Chaton - Artist

@Zoundbie - Sound 

Please enjoy our work and share your valuable feedback ;)

Credits:

this prototype used various freely available assets , many thanks for their providers:
